1. "As an ACCA trainee, I conducted an internal audit of a client's payroll department by reviewing payroll records, conducting employee interviews, and analyzing evidence to form an opinion on compliance with laws and regulations. I demonstrated professional scepticism by questioning any unusual or high-value transactions and basing judgements on sufficient valid evidence."
2. "I performed an external audit of a client's revenue recognition by reviewing sales contracts, comparing them to financial statement, and testing revenue transactions to ensure compliance with accounting standards. I demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging management's estimates and assumptions and basing judgements on sufficient valid evidence."
3. "I conducted an assurance engagement for a client's cash management by reviewing bank statements, reconciling cash accounts, and testing the client's internal controls. I formed an opinion on the effectiveness of cash management and demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging any unusual transactions and basing judgements on valid evidence."
4. "I performed an internal audit of a client's inventory by performing physical inspection of inventory and comparing it to financial statements. I formed an opinion on the accuracy of inventory reporting and demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging any discrepancies and basing judgements on valid evidence."
5. "I conducted an external audit of a client's financial statements of foreign operations, by reviewing the client's financial records, such as bank statements, ledgers, and journal entries. I also performed test of controls and substantive procedures to ensure the accuracy of the financial statements. After evaluating the evidence, I formed an opinion on the fairness of the financial statements and issued an audit report with my findings. Through out the engagement I demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging the assumptions and estimates made by management and ensuring that my judgement were based on sufficient valid evidence."
6. "I performed an assurance engagement for a client's cyber security by reviewing the client's cyber security policies, procedures and testing their IT controls. I formed an opinion on the effectiveness of the client's cyber security controls and demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging existing controls and basing judgements on valid evidence."
7. "I conducted an internal audit of a client's purchasing and procurement process by reviewing purchase orders, vendor invoices, and testing the client's internal controls. I formed an opinion on the effectiveness of the client's purchasing and procurement process and demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging any unusual transactions and basing judgements on valid evidence."
